name: One Strike (itch) (Jake Meaker)
description:
You have One opponent.

You have One chance.

You have One Strike.

Protect your Honour.

Wait for your opportunity and use Space to strike your opponent down!

Created for the GMTKJam 2019 following the theme of "Only One".

While this was mostly a solo project, I outsourced my art to a couple of artist friends of mine:

Jemma Gilbert - Backgrounds, Character Sprites  - https://twitter.com/Jellehtea

LuAnne Boudier  - Title art, Scroll, Katana - https://www.instagram.com/luifex_concepts/

Please check them out, they are incredible artists and were so great to work with!

Menu screen music - Hokito - JohnLaVine333 https://freesound.org/s/81531/  - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/ - no changes made

Taiko drumming - taikoset1_ste58 - whatsanickname4u - https://freesound.org/s/127337/ - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ - no changes made

Gong -  warm gong - Veiler - https://freesound.org/s/207168/ - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/ - no changes made
